content: this legal text is about a case that has been ongoing for over two years it involves two parties one referred to as the petitioner and the other as the counterparty the case was initially heard in the municipal court zagreb and then appealed to the county court varaždin in the first instance the court ordered the counterparty to pay the petitioner a sum of 287280 hrk as their share of the costs of the proceedings the duration of the procedure has been over two years starting from november 30 2018 the final resolution of the case is that the coownership of a threebedroom apartment has been dissolved the court has decided to sell the property through a public auction and divide the proceeds among the coowners based on their ownership shares however the counterparty has objected to this proposal arguing that the property is their home and they have two minor children living there they believe that the court should consider the rights of the children and conduct a proportionality test before making a decision the court has agreed with the objection and annulled the previous decision remanding the case for a new trial the court will now consider the circumstances of the parties and the best interests of the children before making a new decision
